name: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor
desc: A factory class for creating horizontal layout constraint objects using a fluent API.

items.name: func constraint(equalToSystemSpacingAfter: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor, multiplier: CGFloat) -> NSLayoutConstraint
items.desc: Returns a constraint that defines by how much the current anchor trails the specified anchor.

items.name: func constraint(greaterThanOrEqualToSystemSpacingAfter: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor, multiplier: CGFloat) -> NSLayoutConstraint
items.desc: Returns a constraint that defines the minimum amount by which the current anchor trails the specified anchor.

items.name: func constraint(lessThanOrEqualToSystemSpacingAfter: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor, multiplier: CGFloat) -> NSLayoutConstraint
items.desc: Returns a constraint that defines the maximum amount by which the current anchor trails the specified anchor.

items.name: func anchorWithOffset(to: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor) -> NSLayoutDimension
items.desc: Creates a layout dimension object from two anchors.
